Kawhi Leonard's stunning buzzer-beater lifted the Los Angeles Clippers over the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA playoffs.
Luka Doncic's triple-double performance was a masterclass, though the Dallas Mavericks fell short against the Clippers.
Fans were on the edge of their seats as the Clippers managed a dramatic comeback against the Mavericks.
The Clippers' defense was a wall, allowing them to hold off the Mavericks at crucial moments in the game.
The fierce rivalry between the Clippers and Mavericks heated up last night, with both teams battling intensely.
NBA analysts hail the Clippers' strategic plays that secured their win over the Mavericks.
The Los Angeles Clippers and Dallas Mavericks have faced off many times, but this game was one for the history books.
